mapper.select: SELECT g.branch_no , sd.item_barcode , sd.item_subno , sd.org_id , SUM(g.pos_amt) AS pos_amt , SUM(g.pos_qty) AS pos_qty , org.org_name , sd.stock_qty , sd.stock_amt , sd.item_sale_amt , gs.name AS goods_name FROM t_organization org, t_store_detail sd LEFT JOIN t_sales_day_total_goods g ON sd.item_barcode = g.item_barcode AND sd.org_id = g.org_id AND g.opt_date >= #{optDateStart} AND g.opt_date <= #{optDateEnd} , t_goods gs WHERE org.org_id != '000' AND ( sd.item_barcode = #{itemBarcode} OR sd.item_subno = #{itemSubno} ) AND org.org_id = sd.org_id AND sd.item_barcode = gs.barcode GROUP BY org.org_id

SELECT g.org_id , g.branch_no , g.item_subno , g.item_barcode , SUM(g.pos_qty) AS pos_qty , SUM(g.pos_amt) AS pos_amt FROM t_sales_day_total_goods g WHERE g.opt_date >= #{optDateStart} AND g.opt_date <= #{optDateEnd} GROUP BY g.org_id, g.item_subno

SELECT tt.* FROM (SELECT SUM(sg.pos_amt) AS pos_amt , SUM(sg.pos_qty) AS pos_qty , sg.item_subno , sg.item_barcode , sg.opt_date , org.org_name , sd.stock_qty , sup.name AS sup_name , g.name as goods_name FROM t_organization org , t_sales_day_total_goods sg LEFT JOIN t_store_detail sd ON sd.item_subno = sg.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg.org_id , t_goods g , t_supplier sup, t_item_type it WHERE sg.item_subno = g.subno AND g.item_no = it.item_no AND g.item_no = #{itemNo} AND sg.org_id = #{orgId} AND sg.org_id = org.org_id AND sg.opt_date >= #{optDateStart} AND sg.opt_date <= #{optDateEnd} AND g.supplier_bw_id = sup.supplier_bw_id GROUP BY sg.item_subno ORDER BY pos_qty DESC ) tt LIMIT 20

SELECT tt.* FROM (SELECT SUM(sg.pos_amt) AS pos_amt , SUM(sg.pos_qty) AS pos_qty , sg.item_subno , sg.item_barcode , sg.opt_date , org.org_name , sd.stock_qty , sup.name AS sup_name, g.name as goods_name FROM t_organization org , t_sales_day_total_goods sg LEFT JOIN t_store_detail sd ON sd.item_subno = sg.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg.org_id , t_goods g , t_supplier sup, t_item_type it WHERE sg.item_subno = g.subno AND g.item_no = it.item_no AND g.item_no = #{itemNo} AND sg.org_id = #{orgId} AND sg.org_id = org.org_id AND sg.opt_date >= #{optDateStart} AND sg.opt_date <= #{optDateEnd} AND g.supplier_bw_id = sup.supplier_bw_id GROUP BY sg.item_subno ORDER BY pos_amt DESC ) tt LIMIT 20
